page.title: 09HEALTH 1
page.content: Rosewell like any other town has a surgery,only open in the morning, unlike Carrington which has no Health Facilites at all.Carrington's closest Health Centre is Gorebridge. Both Carrington and Rosewell have home helps.Though the home helps in Carrington do a lot more for their patients because of the isolation of the village.Some of Carrington's senior citizens cannot drive and may be bedridden through age or illness.So the home helps do the shopping when possible.This involves driving to the nearest shops which are in Gorebridge,some four miles away.
